text: Do we have the ability to use drag and drop sections within a blog post template?
Not at the moment. Definitely something we’re considering for the future though.
That would be awesome, we are running into a case where editors want to add forms/modules/etc which the blog content itself
oh yeah definitely. Would drag and drop typically happen inside the post body for you guys? Or outside?
Hey John, can you tell me more about that? Is there a variable that is editable at the editor level you’re looking to pre-set?
I guess the easiest way would be to do it within the post body that way we can have full control over the post itself, but having it on the the layout itself would be helpful too
yes that is exactly what I am wanting. Specifically in Typography
